title: Wet Bum - aka Surfacing (2014 - Canada) [TIFF Rising Stars]
description:
Wet Bum (2014 - Canada)                           aka Surfacing

Drama / Family

director . . . . Lindsay Mackay
starring . . . . Julia Sarah Stone, Kenneth Welsh, Craig Arnold
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3630720/


TIFF Rising Stars Award - WON - Julia Sarah Stone

A coming-of-age movie driven by sharp observations and a poetic sensitivity towards its outcast characters, first-time feature filmmaker Lindsay MacKay's Wet Bum was developed as part of TIFF's professional development program STUDIO and is graced by an exceptional lead turn from 2014 TIFF Rising Star Julia Sarah Stone.

Expected to work as a cleaner in the seniors' residence her mother manages, fourteen-year-old Sam endures a daily gauntlet of disgruntled residents. In addition, her slower physical development has made her very self-conscious about her body. Unhappy amongst her schoolmates, Sam finds herself increasingly drawn to two of the seniors at her work. As her relationship with them deepens, she finds worlds far more complex and intriguing than the one inhabited by her peers.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 720x464, 23.976 fps, 1800 Kbps, 01h38m25s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, 6 channel, 448 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
